column2: Our Double studio's (20m2) are perfect for a night in the city. With a queen size bed, full kitchen and private bathroom you have all the comfort of a city apartment.

column1: Gorgeous family apartment in heart of Paris!
column2: Spacious and stylish apartment in the center of Paris. Newly refurbished. It has 3 large bedrooms with queen size beds, 1 living room with a sofa-bed, 1 bathroom and 1 toilet. It is 2mn walk to the metro, close to all sights and museums in Paris. Vibrant area with many cafes and shops. Walking distance to the Louvre (10mn).
